title: Greg LeMond and the legendary Tour de France winner’s fight with leukemia: ‘I feel so much better’
content:
In long-awaited health update, US cycling icon believes his cancer can be traced to his 1987 shooting accident: 'Since I got shot and got all this lead in me, I’ve never felt truly healthy for all those years.'

Read the full article at Greg LeMond and the legendary Tour de France winner’s fight with leukemia: ‘I feel so much better’ on Velo.
author: ahood
